title: Diskeeper 2011 Pro Premier v15.0 [Multilanguaje]
description:
Diskeeper 2011 Pro Premier v15.0 [Multilanguaje]

English:
------------
Category: Programs
Language: Multilenguaje including Spanish 
Operating system: Windows 2000 | XP | Vista | 7 (32-64 Bit)

Description:
New Diskeeper 2011 with the full strategy IntelliWrite rises to another level by solving the direct fragmentation as files are written to disk. As a result, Diskeeper prevents up to 85% of the fragmentation on the disk, leaving only a small quantity to be eliminated quickly by the powerful and invisible engines of Diskeeper defrag.

The only investment that pays for itself many times to recover the performance and extend the life of the hardware is Diskeeper with InvisiTasking. Once installed, Diskeeper invisibly and automatically keeps the performance from that day forward. The performance is constantly maximized, hardware life is extended and expensive upgrades and renovations are postponed. Diskeeper is the solution for IT in tough times.

Diskeeper 2011 features automatic defragmentation, which means that fragmentation is now solved as it occurs without long maintenance processes and uncoordinated. The schedule for the defragmentation process (deprived of valuable IT hours) is long gone. And with the new InvisiTasking ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢ technology, defragmentation is carried out transparently. There is no resource conflict because Diskeeper 2011 uses untapped resources and not used to defragment your volumes. Performance and productivity from their PCs will never be impacted by the consolidation of free space on your drives.
